title: How will the new IE affect Yasuo?
body:
How do you guys think the PBE changes to IE will affect Yasuo?
changing the crit strike chance form 25% to 20% will hit him hard, he will either have to build a 3rd crit item just for that extra 5% which will sacrifice his late game damage, or make up the extra crit strike with runes which will affect his early game damage. 
either way his damage is affected, but do you guys think its enough to bring him down to a manageable level? or just slightly irritate him.

i want to play one of my favourite champs again without feeling like a dick when i do. so I'm really hoping these changes will hit him hard so i can play him again without feeling like a Master Yi main.

what do you guys think?

HP being a wasted stat is a long shot, but then AS is kind of wasted once you have max CDR on Q....but AP where? mana not used at all either....
